classes.name: Mood Symptoms
classes.description: Depression, mania, sadness, euphoria, irritability, mood swings, anhedonia, hopelessness.

classes.name: Anxiety Symptoms
classes.description: Worry, panic, nervousness, fear, phobias, social anxiety, generalized anxiety, tension.

classes.name: Psychotic Symptoms
classes.description: Hallucinations, delusions, paranoia, disorganized thinking, thought broadcasting, persecution.

classes.name: Cognitive Symptoms
classes.description: Memory problems, concentration difficulties, confusion, disorientation, executive dysfunction.

classes.name: Sleep Symptoms
classes.description: Insomnia, hypersomnia, sleep disturbance, nightmares, early morning awakening, sleep quality.

classes.name: Appetite/Weight
classes.description: Changes in appetite, weight loss, weight gain, eating patterns, food intake changes.

classes.name: Energy/Fatigue
classes.description: Fatigue, low energy, exhaustion, tiredness, lethargy, lack of motivation.

classes.name: Trauma Symptoms
classes.description: PTSD, flashbacks, nightmares, hypervigilance, avoidance, traumatic memories, triggers.

classes.name: Somatic Symptoms
classes.description: Physical complaints, headaches, pain, bodily concerns, physical manifestations of distress.

classes.name: Impulse Control
classes.description: Impulsivity, aggression, anger outbursts, self-harm urges, reckless behavior.

classes.name: Obsessive-Compulsive
classes.description: Obsessions, compulsions, intrusive thoughts, rituals, checking, cleaning, ordering.

classes.name: Dissociative Symptoms
classes.description: Depersonalization, derealization, dissociation, feeling detached, out of body experiences.
